ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Best Melee Race/Class
ygData.msgSnippet: try a dark elf shadow knight....I m having a lot of fun with mine :) ... _________________________________________________________________ Get your FREE
ygData.messageBody:
try a dark elf shadow knight....I'm having a lot of fun with mine :)


>From: Denis Baldwin <dbaldwin@...>
>Reply-To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>To: "'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'" <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
>Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Best Melee Race/Class
>Date: Tue, 7 Aug 2001 13:32:42 -0400
>
>By "best", I mean one that will level easy, do a lot of damage and be able
>to group well. I don't care about the ability to solo or take a lot of
>damage, just dealing it.
>
>Denis
>

>Denis A. Baldwin (A+/MCP/I-Net+/Net+/CCA)
